GSD.description:
ax25: Fix UAF bugs in ax25 timers

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.35 by commit 85f25bb9a0051198af48ac2f3afc9f16f2277114. For more details please see the references link.
